word:
"THE FIRST EDITION OF THIS BOOK WAS PUBLISHED IN CALIFORNIA IN 1884. WHEN SPIRIT OF PROPHECY, VOLUME III 
                                                                           438
WAS PRINTED, THERE WAS SOME MATTER LEFT OVER. A PORTION OF THIS WAS PRINTED IN PAMPHLET FORM AND CIRCULATED; AND IT WAS EXPECTED THAT MOTHER WOULD PROCEED IMMEDIATELY TO ADD TO THIS MATTER AND BRING OUT VOLUME IV. BEFORE FATHER'S DEATH HE HAD ADVERTISED THE BOOK, SPIRIT OF PROPHECY, VOLUME IV.
